# Short WriteUp -- Bing

## Description 

> We happened to intercept communication between two major urban gangs of Thailand, at first glance it seems to be in Indo-Chinese but on further analysis, we found out it to be some pseudo-language created by them for inner communication. Can you crack it?

## Solution

The solution is fairly direct with the right intuition i suppose, 

Given file contained a base64 string,
```

```

Once decoded it will look like this, and i did not know chinese 0_0
```

Assuming the orgs did not also know chinese xD , I started analysing it a bit more closely, and there it lies, **Repeating characters**

So I went ahead with my hunch to replace all the chinese characters with `ABCDEFG`, and this is what I got, 
```

```

You might notice repeating patterns here as well, splitting those gives u,
```

Once again, substituting the blocks with 0s and 1s we get,
```

```

Converting that to ASCII, we get the flag

Flag: `domectf{y4yy0u9077h3c0223c7f149myf213nd}`
